mapper.sql: ID, TRANS_NUM, POLICY_NO, INVT_NO, INVESTMENT_TYPE, RATIO, VALUE
mapper.select: SELECT f1.ID, f1.TRANS_NUM, f1.POLICY_NO, f1.INVT_NO, f1.INVESTMENT_TYPE, f1.[VALUE], f2.RATIO, f2.INVT_NO IN_INVT_NO FROM (SELECT * FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_FUND_CONVERSION WHERE INVESTMENT_TYPE='OUT') f1 INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_FUND_CONVERSION WHERE INVESTMENT_TYPE='IN') f2 ON f1.TRANS_NUM = f2.TRANS_NUM WHERE f1.TRANS_NUM = #{transNum}

SELECT TOP 1 U.ROC_ID rocId, SWIFT_CODE swiftCode, ENGLISH_NAME englishName, BANK_CODE bankCode, BRANCH_CODE branchCode, ACCOUNT_NAME accountName, BANK_ACCOUNT bankAccount, BANK_NAME bankName, BRANCH_NAME branchName FROM TRANS_FUND_CONVERSION C INNER JOIN TRANS T ON T.TRANS_NUM = C.TRANS_NUM LEFT JOIN USERS U ON T.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.TRANS_NUM = #{transNum} AND INVT_NO = #{invtNo} AND INVESTMENT_TYPE = 'IN'
